ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.9 on 2024-07-27T21:43:58 [Issue ID 4000-469601] urn:comicvine:4000-469601
ComicInfo.Summary:
Love is a lie in Greysuit by Pat Mills, John Higgins, and Sally Hurst in this week’s 2000 AD! Also in this issue of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: Block Judge by John Wagner and Carlos Ezquerra, Kingdom: Aux Drift by Dan Abnett, Richard Elson and Abigail Ryder, Stickleback: The Thru’Penny Opera by Ian Edginton and D'Israeli, and Ichabod Azrael: One Last Bullet by Rob Williams and Mike Dowling.
Cover: John Higgins
Judge Dredd - Block Judge (Part Seven) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)Stickleback - The Thru'Penny Opera (Part Seven) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)Greysuit - Prince of Darkness (Part Six) (Pat Mills - John Higgins)The Grievous Journey of Ichabod Azrael (And the Dead Left In His Wake) - One Last Bullet (Part Six) (Rob Williams - Michael Dowling)Kingdom - Aux Drift (Part Seven) (Dan Abnett - Richard Elson)
ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1906
ComicInfo.Writer: Dan Abnett,Ian Edginton,John Wagner,Pat Mills,Rob Williams
